revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = QNAP HS-210.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Silent & Fanless NAS |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.qnap.com/en-us/product/hs-210 |sp = https://www.qnap.com/en-us/download?model=hs-210 |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = QNAP |model = HS-210 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS enclosure |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6282;Armada 300, (Feroceon core); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v5<!-- TE --> |cpu1spd = 1.6 GHz <!-- 1.2 / 1.6 / 2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;N25Q128A; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G83CFR-PBC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1318; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:08:9B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.5.3; |stockos = Linux;3.4.6;QTS 4.2.2;
|exp_if_types = SATA II, USB 2.0 (Type A), USB 3.0 (Type A), SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, buzzer, power switch, heatsink |addchip = 2-Wire RTC IC;Seiko;S35390A;;1;,,, System Controller IC;Microchip;PIC16F690;;1;,,, USB 3.0 Host Controller;EtronTech;EJ168A;;1;,,, 2Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02C;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, USB 2.0 SD/MMC Flash Card Reader IC;Genesys Logic;GL823;;1;,,, 30V 9A P-Channel MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP4435GM;;1;,,, 1MHz 4.5A Peak Current-Limit Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PG847B;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 169.254.100.100 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 12/31/2020 |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 11/2013 |estprice = 290 |upc = 885022004911 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16822107145 |asin = B00H3VBKBM |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "QW01" and "V1.2" are silkscreened on the board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6282 @1.6GHz (''Armada 300'' ARM V5) *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 16MB SPI NOR Flash, 2x SATA II, SD Card Slot *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 Type A, 2x USB 3.0 Type A *Power: 12V, 5A via barrel
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.techspot.com/review/767-qnap-hs-210/ QNAP HS-210 Silent NAS Review on '''TECHSPOT'''] *[https://www.techadvisor.com/review/qnap-hs-210-review-3543713/ QNAP HS-210 Review on '''TECH ADVISOR'''] *[https://www.tweaktown.com/reviews/6068/qnap-hs-210-2-bay-media-sharing-nas-review-reduced-in-size-for-your-living-room/index.html QNAP HS-210 2-Bay Media Sharing NAS Review on '''TweakTown''']
